column4: anyone in here know anything about not getting sound in flash and also getting no sound from ubuntu as far as system sounds and startup music but for whatever reason if i play a song in rythmnox it works fine?
its a own issue uninstalling it and getting the deb from the flash site fixes it
i have done that however the issue is not with the flash plugin itself as that seems to be working fine i also get no system sounds only audio from media players
go to prefs and sound and switch them from pulse to alisa
